title: Kerion Discography (2008-2012) (320kbps) (Symphonic Metal)
description:
This discography was hard to find so help me seed and keep this torrent alive ! Sorry if my upload rate isn't high but don't worry i'll seed everyday (not all the time) for at least a week (I will seed of course after that). Also please comment if you have a request for discography (and/or album) and I will gladly search for it. And a thank you is always welcome !
